titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures of polyethylene glycol, C16-C18 fatty acids, and C2-C6 aliphatic hydrocarbons.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on mixtures of polyethylene glycol, C16-C18 fatty acids, and C2-C6 aliphatic hydrocarbons.
